introduction: Darazi Travels is located on El Mina Street behind Gingers, Tripoli, Lebanon 1300. Contact us at +961 03 859 219 or email fdarazitravel@gmail.com.

packages.adha: Our Adha package offers a trip to Turkey for $550. 4 Days and 3 Nights including: 4-star hotel, breakfast, and round-trip transport.
packages.sharm: Our Sharm El Sheikh package is $450. It includes a 4-star all-inclusive hotel for 4 days and 3 nights.

operation_hours: Our operating hours are from 10 AM to 5 PM, Monday to Saturday.
contact_agent: To connect with an agent, please email fdarazitravel@gmail.com or call +961 03 859 219.
